name: Formtool-3040 As a Fan, I would like to be able to use my Okta credentials for a product purchase form, so that my identity can be confirmed for my purchase
Formtool-3031 The "Credit Card Type" field has a default value instead of placeholder text
Formtool-3014 As a Fan, I would like to have my shipping information be the same as my billing information so that I do not have to re-enter information
Formtool-2970 As a Club Employee, I would like to see the billing and shipping information entered by a fan on a transactional form so I can fulfill their order
Formtool-2969 As a Fan, I would like billing and shipping fields to appear on a transactional form so I can successfully pay later
Formtool-2855 As an Editor, I would like to have billing and shipping fields built into a transactional form so that I do not have to manually add them to the right location on a form
Formtool-3019As a fan, I would like to know if a product is required or that I have entered partial information for the product so that I fill out the form correctly
Formtool-3050 [HOTFIX] Add Payment Type to order creation call
Formtool-2944 As an Editor, I would like to be warned if I have not added a product to a form, so that I can correct any issues before approval
Formtool-2905  [Bug] Pressing the Enter key on a Form Settings page prompts the user to select a file to upload
Formtool-3033  Bug | Empty min and max quantity and min and max price fields do not trigger a warning and prevent saving
Formtool-3042  As an Fan, I would like to exclude 3:33 am game times from a game dropdown so that I do not show tentative 3:33 am game times
